entries.description: styling issue in CodeWhisperer reference log
CodeWhisperer duplicate closing bracket when using recommendation inside brackets
CodeWhisperer triggered by React plugin generated code snippets
cached ECS/EC2 credentials not refreshed when expired
malformed ECS icons on recent versions of VS Code
running commands on ECS tasks can now be cancelled
"AWS (Developer)" menu now includes a "Show Global State" item
Resources (in AWS Explorer) can list more resource types for EC2, IoT, RDS, Redshift, NetworkManager, and other services
Prompt users to install YAML plugin when AWSTemplateFormatVersion becomes available in their YAML document
ECS tasks can be opened up in the terminal
